author: wn.com
title: Mayor Bowser Announces $47 Million to Benefit Residents in All 8 Wards (District of Columbia ...
text: ( Source : District of Columbia Executive Office of the Mayor ) Today , Mayor Muriel Bowser announced $47 million in funding for community and other critical investments. The funds were assembled from agency underspending from the 2015 fiscal
